by the confidence and support of those who believe we should pursue the presidency, but after much deliberation and prayer, we believe our calling is closer to home," Mike Pence said in a letter to supporters. In the choice between seeking national office and serving Indiana in some capacity, we choose Indiana. We will not seek the Republican nomination for president in 2012. Mike Pence said he would make a decision about his future later and would be traveling across the state in the months ahead to "learn about how Hoosiers think we might best contribute in the years ahead.
